thread.title: Students Vote To Declare FSU A Sanctuary Campus
thread.title_full: Students Vote To Declare FSU A Sanctuary Campus

title: Students Vote To Declare FSU A Sanctuary Campus
text:
Students Vote To Declare FSU A Sanctuary Campus posted by G. Byrd, J Conrad - Just now share 
Tallahassee, Fla. (970 WFLA)- Students at Florida State University in Tallahassee, vote to declare their school a sanctuary campus. 
The referendum proposed by the FSU chapter of Students for a Democratic Society, passed with 66 percent of the vote. 
It calls for FSU administration to agree not to share information with immigration enforcement, and agree not to take scholarships or any state tuition away from students brought to the U-S illegally as children. 
Of course, the students don't have the final say over whether FSU becomes a sanctuary campus. 
The student government association will have to act and decide to move it forward to the university administration. 
Graphic Credit: FSU
